Vesparos: What settings did you change in Azurus to get faster download speeds? Thanks.

Whatever bittorrent client you are using, make sure that A) Maximum connections is unlimmited B) Maximum download speed is unlimmited. If you use azureus, you have to change it in like 3 different places.
How do I make my connections-limit unlimited?

@getbusyliving 
Click on Tools > Options. 
Make sure you are in advance mode. 
Click the 'Transfer' menu and set Max download speed to "0" for unlimmited. 
Change Max connections per torrent and max connections globally to "0" for unlimmited. 
Check allow multiple connections from the Same IP.
oh, and don't forget to save ;)

getbusyliving: in your 'my torrents' list double click on the bioshock torrent. Then click the options tab and make sure everything is right in there too. Those options may have not been applied to that torrent since it was already added to your list when you input the main azureus options.

System Reqs for those that would like to know.

Minimum: Operating System: Windows XP (with Service Pack 2) or Windows Vista, CPU: Intel single-core Pentium 4 processor at 2.4GHz, System RAM: 1 GB, Video Card: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 128MB RAM (NVIDIA 6600 or better/ATI X1300 or better, excluding ATI X1550), Sound Card: 100% direct X 9.0c compatible sound card, 8GB of free hard drive space.

Recommended: CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo processor; System RAM: 2GB; Video Card: DX 9 - Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 512 MB RAM (NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GT or better), DX 10 - NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better; Sound Card: SoundBlaster(r) X-Fi(tm) series (optimized foruse with Creative Labs EAX ADVANCED HD 4.0 or EAX ADVANCED HD 5.0 compatible sound cards); Important Note: Game requires Internet connection for activation
